### Generated by BLACKBOX.AI
https://www.blackbox.ai
### YOU
crea un sitio web que me genere un link que me de la ubicacion en un mapa real de la persona que lo abra
### BLACKBOX.AI


El usuario quiere un sitio web que genere un enlace que muestre la ubicación en tiempo real de la persona que lo abra. Esto implica:

1. Crear un sitio web que solicite permisos de geolocalización
2. Usar la API de geolocalización del navegador
3. Generar un enlace que muestre esa ubicación en un mapa (probablemente Google Maps o similar)
4. Mostrar una interfaz atractiva y funcional

Voy a crear un archivo HTML que incluya:
- Diseño atractivo con CSS/Tailwind
- Funcionalidad JavaScript para geolocalización
- Generación de enlaces a Google Maps
- Manejo de errores y estados
- Elementos visuales con imágenes placeholder como se requiere

Necesito usar https://placehold.co para las imágenes con descripciones detalladas en el alt text.


`ubicacion-mapa.html`
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Localizador en Tiempo Real</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap');
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            padding: 20px;
        }
        
        .card {
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }
        
        .pulse {
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }
        
        .success-check {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: #10b981;
            color: white;
            font-size: 40px;
            animation: scaleIn 0.5s ease-out;
        }
        
        @keyframes scaleIn {
            from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
            to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        .copy-btn {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .copy-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .copy-btn.copied {
            background: #10b981 !important;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen">
    <div class="card max-w-md w-full p-8">
        <!-- Header -->
        <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <div class="w-24 h-24 mx-auto mb-4 bg-blue-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center pulse">
                <svg class="w-12 h-12 text-blue-600" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M17.657 16.657L13.414 20.9a1.998 1.998 0 01-2.827 0l-4.244-4.243a8 8 0 1111.314 0z"></path>
                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15 11a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z"></path>
                </svg>
            </div>
            <h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2">Localizador en Tiempo Real</h1>
            <p class="text-gray-600">Genera un enlace que muestra tu ubicación actual en el mapa</p>
        </div>

        <!-- Preview Image -->
        <div class="mb-6 rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-md">
            <img 
                src="https://placehold.co/600x300" 
                alt="Interfaz moderna de mapa digital con marcador de ubicación y calles en vista satelital" 
                class="w-full h-48 object-cover"
                onerror="this.src='data:image/svg+xml;base64,'"
            />
        </div>

        <!-- Status Messages -->
        <div id="status" class="mb-6 hidden">
            <div class="p-4 rounded-lg bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200">
                <div class="flex items-center">
                    <svg class="w-5 h-5 text-blue-600 mr-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M13 16h-1v-4h-1m1-4h.01M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"></path>
                    </svg>
                    <span id="status-text" class="text-blue-800"></span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Location Button -->
        <button 
            id="getLocationBtn" 
            class="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-semibold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center justify-center"
        >
            <svg class="w-5 h-5 mr-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M17.657 16.657L13.414 20.9a1.998 1.998 0 01-2.827 0l-4.244-4.243a8 8 0 1111.314 0z"></path>
                <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15 11a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z"></path>
            </svg>
            Obtener Mi Ubicación
        </button>

        <!-- Results Section -->
        <div id="results" class="hidden mt-8">
            <div class="bg-green-50 border border-green-200 rounded-lg p-6 mb-6">
                <div class="text-center mb-4">
                    <div class="success-check mx-auto">
                        ✓
                    </div>
                </div>
                <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-green-800 mb-3 text-center">¡Ubicación Obtenida!</h3>
                
                <div class="mb-4">
                    <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-green-700 mb-2">Enlace del Mapa:</label>
                    <div class="flex gap-2">
                        <input 
                            id="mapLink" 
                            type="text" 
                            readonly 
                            class="flex-1 px-3 py-2 border border-green-300 rounded-lg bg-white text-green-900 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500"
                        >
                        <button 
                            id="copyBtn" 
                            class="copy-btn bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200"
                        >
                            Copiar
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <a 
                    id="openMapBtn" 
                    href="#" 
                    target="_blank" 
                    class="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-semibold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center justify-center mt-4"
                >
                    <svg class="w-5 h-5 mr-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M3 9l9-7 9 7v11a2 2 0 01-2 2H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V9z"></path>
                    </svg>
                    Abrir en Google Maps
                </a>
            </div>

            <!-- Location Details -->
            <div class="bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-4">
                <h4 class="font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3">Detalles de la Ubicación:</h4>
                <div class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 text-sm">
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Latitud:</span>
                        <span id="latitude" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Longitud:</span>
                        <span id="longitude" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Precisión:</span>
                        <span id="accuracy" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Altitud:</span>
                        <span id="altitude" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const getLocationBtn = document.getElementById('getLocationBtn');
            const statusDiv = document.getElementById('status');
            const statusText = document.getElementById('status-text');
            const resultsDiv = document.getElementById('results');
            const mapLinkInput = document.getElementById('mapLink');
            const copyBtn = document.getElementById('copyBtn');
            const openMapBtn = document.getElementById('openMapBtn');
            const latitudeSpan = document.getElementById('latitude');
            const longitudeSpan = document.getElementById('longitude');
            const accuracySpan = document.getElementById('accuracy');
            const altitudeSpan = document.getElementById('altitude');

            function showStatus(message, type = 'info') {
                statusText.textContent = message;
                statusDiv.className = `mb-6 ${type === 'error' ? 'bg-red-50 border-red-200' : 'bg-blue-50 border-blue-200'}`;
                statusDiv.classList.remove('hidden');
            }

            function hideStatus() {
                statusDiv.classList.add('hidden');
            }

            function generateGoogleMapsLink(latitude, longitude) {
                return `https://www.google.com/maps?q=${latitude},${longitude}&z=15`;
            }

            function getLocation() {
                if (!navigator.geolocation) {
                    showStatus('La geolocalización no es soportada por este navegador.', 'error');
                    return;
                }

                showStatus('Solicitando permiso de ubicación...');
                
                const options = {
                    enableHighAccuracy: true,
                    timeout: 10000,
                    maximumAge: 0
                };

                navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(
                    function(position) {
                        hideStatus();
                        const lat = position.coords.latitude;
                        const lng = position.coords.longitude;
                        const accuracy = position.coords.accuracy;
                        const altitude = position.coords.altitude;

                        // Update details
                        latitudeSpan.textContent = lat.toFixed(6);
                        longitudeSpan.textContent = lng.toFixed(6);
                        accuracySpan.textContent = `${accuracy.toFixed(2)} metros`;
                        altitudeSpan.textContent = altitude ? `${altitude.toFixed(2)} metros` : 'No disponible';

                        // Generate and set map link
                        const mapLink = generateGoogleMapsLink(lat, lng);
                        mapLinkInput.value = mapLink;
                        openMapBtn.href = mapLink;

                        // Show results
                        resultsDiv.classList.remove('hidden');
                        
                        // Scroll to results
                        resultsDiv.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
                    },
                    function(error) {
                        let errorMessage;
                        switch(error.code) {
                            case error.PERMISSION_DENIED:
                                errorMessage = 'Permiso de ubicación denegado. Por favor, habilita la geolocalización en tu navegador.';
                                break;
                            case error.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE:
                                errorMessage = 'Información de ubicación no disponible.';
                                break;
                            case error.TIMEOUT:
                                errorMessage = 'Tiempo de espera agotado al obtener la ubicación.';
                                break;
                            default:
                                errorMessage = 'Error desconocido al obtener la ubicación.';
                        }
                        showStatus(errorMessage, 'error');
                    },
                    options
                );
            }

            getLocationBtn.addEventListener('click', getLocation);

            copyBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                mapLinkInput.select();
                document.execCommand('copy');
                
                // Visual feedback
                const originalText = copyBtn.textContent;
                copyBtn.textContent = '¡Copiado!';
                copyBtn.classList.add('copied');
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    copyBtn.textContent = originalText;
                    copyBtn.classList.remove('copied');
                }, 2000);
            });

            // Add keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Cmd + L)
            document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
                if ((e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) && e.key === 'l') {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    getLocationBtn.click();
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```


</create_file>

🎨 **Generating images based on descriptions...**

✅ **Images generated successfully! Here's your updated content:**

`ubicacion-mapa.html`
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Localizador en Tiempo Real</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap');
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            padding: 20px;
        }
        
        .card {
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }
        
        .pulse {
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }
        
        .success-check {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: #10b981;
            color: white;
            font-size: 40px;
            animation: scaleIn 0.5s ease-out;
        }
        
        @keyframes scaleIn {
            from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
            to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
        }
        
        .copy-btn {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .copy-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .copy-btn.copied {
            background: #10b981 !important;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen">
    <div class="card max-w-md w-full p-8">
        <!-- Header -->
        <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <div class="w-24 h-24 mx-auto mb-4 bg-blue-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center pulse">
                <svg class="w-12 h-12 text-blue-600" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M17.657 16.657L13.414 20.9a1.998 1.998 0 01-2.827 0l-4.244-4.243a8 8 0 1111.314 0z"></path>
                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15 11a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z"></path>
                </svg>
            </div>
            <h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2">Localizador en Tiempo Real</h1>
            <p class="text-gray-600">Genera un enlace que muestra tu ubicación actual en el mapa</p>
        </div>

        <!-- Preview Image -->
        <div class="mb-6 rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-md">
            <img 
                src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/7682ce73-3952-4181-bd09-5c1a9ea5b5d7.png" 
                alt="Interfaz moderna de mapa digital con marcador de ubicación y calles en vista satelital" 
                class="w-full h-48 object-cover"
                onerror="this.src='data:image/svg+xml;base64,'"
            />
        </div>

        <!-- Status Messages -->
        <div id="status" class="mb-6 hidden">
            <div class="p-4 rounded-lg bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200">
                <div class="flex items-center">
                    <svg class="w-5 h-5 text-blue-600 mr-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M13 16h-1v-4h-1m1-4h.01M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"></path>
                    </svg>
                    <span id="status-text" class="text-blue-800"></span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Location Button -->
        <button 
            id="getLocationBtn" 
            class="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-semibold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center justify-center"
        >
            <svg class="w-5 h-5 mr-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M17.657 16.657L13.414 20.9a1.998 1.998 0 01-2.827 0l-4.244-4.243a8 8 0 1111.314 0z"></path>
                <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15 11a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z"></path>
            </svg>
            Obtener Mi Ubicación
        </button>

        <!-- Results Section -->
        <div id="results" class="hidden mt-8">
            <div class="bg-green-50 border border-green-200 rounded-lg p-6 mb-6">
                <div class="text-center mb-4">
                    <div class="success-check mx-auto">
                        ✓
                    </div>
                </div>
                <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-green-800 mb-3 text-center">¡Ubicación Obtenida!</h3>
                
                <div class="mb-4">
                    <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-green-700 mb-2">Enlace del Mapa:</label>
                    <div class="flex gap-2">
                        <input 
                            id="mapLink" 
                            type="text" 
                            readonly 
                            class="flex-1 px-3 py-2 border border-green-300 rounded-lg bg-white text-green-900 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500"
                        >
                        <button 
                            id="copyBtn" 
                            class="copy-btn bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200"
                        >
                            Copiar
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <a 
                    id="openMapBtn" 
                    href="#" 
                    target="_blank" 
                    class="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-semibold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center justify-center mt-4"
                >
                    <svg class="w-5 h-5 mr-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M3 9l9-7 9 7v11a2 2 0 01-2 2H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V9z"></path>
                    </svg>
                    Abrir en Google Maps
                </a>
            </div>

            <!-- Location Details -->
            <div class="bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-4">
                <h4 class="font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3">Detalles de la Ubicación:</h4>
                <div class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 text-sm">
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Latitud:</span>
                        <span id="latitude" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Longitud:</span>
                        <span id="longitude" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Precisión:</span>
                        <span id="accuracy" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-gray-600">Altitud:</span>
                        <span id="altitude" class="font-medium text-gray-800"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const getLocationBtn = document.getElementById('getLocationBtn');
            const statusDiv = document.getElementById('status');
            const statusText = document.getElementById('status-text');
            const resultsDiv = document.getElementById('results');
            const mapLinkInput = document.getElementById('mapLink');
            const copyBtn = document.getElementById('copyBtn');
            const openMapBtn = document.getElementById('openMapBtn');
            const latitudeSpan = document.getElementById('latitude');
            const longitudeSpan = document.getElementById('longitude');
            const accuracySpan = document.getElementById('accuracy');
            const altitudeSpan = document.getElementById('altitude');

            function showStatus(message, type = 'info') {
                statusText.textContent = message;
                statusDiv.className = `mb-6 ${type === 'error' ? 'bg-red-50 border-red-200' : 'bg-blue-50 border-blue-200'}`;
                statusDiv.classList.remove('hidden');
            }

            function hideStatus() {
                statusDiv.classList.add('hidden');
            }

            function generateGoogleMapsLink(latitude, longitude) {
                return `https://www.google.com/maps?q=${latitude},${longitude}&z=15`;
            }

            function getLocation() {
                if (!navigator.geolocation) {
                    showStatus('La geolocalización no es soportada por este navegador.', 'error');
                    return;
                }

                showStatus('Solicitando permiso de ubicación...');
                
                const options = {
                    enableHighAccuracy: true,
                    timeout: 10000,
                    maximumAge: 0
                };

                navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(
                    function(position) {
                        hideStatus();
                        const lat = position.coords.latitude;
                        const lng = position.coords.longitude;
                        const accuracy = position.coords.accuracy;
                        const altitude = position.coords.altitude;

                        // Update details
                        latitudeSpan.textContent = lat.toFixed(6);
                        longitudeSpan.textContent = lng.toFixed(6);
                        accuracySpan.textContent = `${accuracy.toFixed(2)} metros`;
                        altitudeSpan.textContent = altitude ? `${altitude.toFixed(2)} metros` : 'No disponible';

                        // Generate and set map link
                        const mapLink = generateGoogleMapsLink(lat, lng);
                        mapLinkInput.value = mapLink;
                        openMapBtn.href = mapLink;

                        // Show results
                        resultsDiv.classList.remove('hidden');
                        
                        // Scroll to results
                        resultsDiv.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
                    },
                    function(error) {
                        let errorMessage;
                        switch(error.code) {
                            case error.PERMISSION_DENIED:
                                errorMessage = 'Permiso de ubicación denegado. Por favor, habilita la geolocalización en tu navegador.';
                                break;
                            case error.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE:
                                errorMessage = 'Información de ubicación no disponible.';
                                break;
                            case error.TIMEOUT:
                                errorMessage = 'Tiempo de espera agotado al obtener la ubicación.';
                                break;
                            default:
                                errorMessage = 'Error desconocido al obtener la ubicación.';
                        }
                        showStatus(errorMessage, 'error');
                    },
                    options
                );
            }

            getLocationBtn.addEventListener('click', getLocation);

            copyBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                mapLinkInput.select();
                document.execCommand('copy');
                
                // Visual feedback
                const originalText = copyBtn.textContent;
                copyBtn.textContent = '¡Copiado!';
                copyBtn.classList.add('copied');
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    copyBtn.textContent = originalText;
                    copyBtn.classList.remove('copied');
                }, 2000);
            });

            // Add keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Cmd + L)
            document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
                if ((e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) && e.key === 'l') {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    getLocationBtn.click();
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

 Login to continue using
